entity.name: connection_of_individual_product
entity.description:
A connection_of_individual_product is a type of product_definition_formation_relationship that is a
Connection of individual product (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: relating_product_definition_formation
explicit.description: a instance of product_as_individual_version that is connected as side 2.

explicit.name: related_product_definition_formation
explicit.description: an instance of product_as_individual_version that is connected as side 1.
